title: Trump DC facelift will extend to Kennedy Center, Lincoln bathroom
shortDescription: The former real estate developer in the White House has moved in his second term to put his stamp not just on policy, but on the physical landscape.

title: Newsom signs ‘Election Rigging Response Act’ in retaliation to Texas
shortDescription: California passes bills to let voters redraw U.S. House maps in 2026, countering Texas’ planned redistricting to boost GOP seats. (Scripps News)

title: Texas lawmakers near final redistricting vote to gerrymander the state
shortDescription: The Texas Senate expected to vote Friday to send the GOP majority's gerrymander to the governor's desk for approval.

title: Trump calls former national security adviser John Bolton a 'lowlife'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called his former national security adviser John Bolton a 'lowlife' but said he didn't know about the FBI search of his home.

title: Trump calls on Fed Governor Cook to resign over mortgage allegations
shortDescription: President Donald Trump called on Federal Reserve Governor Lisa Cook to resign following allegations about mortgages she holds in Michigan and Georgia.

title: FBI raids former Trump adviser John Bolton’s home in classified documents probe
shortDescription: FBI agents raided ex–Trump adviser John Bolton’s home over an alleged classified documents probe tied to theft, misuse and retention concerns.

title: Live: FBI searches home of John Bolton, a prominent Trump critic
shortDescription: The FBI was searching the home of former national security adviser John Bolton, who has become a critic of President Trump, according to news reports.

title: Trump visits troops, police in DC
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said troops were "going to stay here awhile" when he visited law enforcement officials in the capital.

title: Trump declares victory in DC, brings pizza and says city is 'safe'
shortDescription: In the seven days since Trump deployed 800 National Guard troops in DC, violent crime is down 22% comapred to previous seven days

title: Trump NJ prosecutor pick Alina Habba acting unlawfully, judge rules
shortDescription: President Donald Trump's pick for the top federal prosecutor in New Jersey, Alina Habba, has been serving unlawfully since July 1, a judge ruled.

title: Newsom mocks Trump in all-caps social media feud
shortDescription: California Gov. Gavin Newsom is mocking President Donald Trump in all-caps posts as their feud escalates over redistricting and 2028 political stakes.

title: Who is Tina Peters? What to know after Trump calls for her release
shortDescription: Trump threatens Colorado with ‘harsh measures’ unless it frees Tina Peters, who is serving a nine-year sentence for election data scheme.

title: Supreme Court allows Trump to cut NIH research grants he targeted for DEI
shortDescription: The Trump administration said it should be able to end health research grants that promote DEI. A federal judge said the cuts amount to discrimination.

title: Trump and GOP on verge of big win in Texas: 5 takeaways
shortDescription: Trump's Texas fight is aimed at giving the GOP an advantage in 2026 and a lame-duck president more power while in office. Democrats have other plans.

title: Trump wins fraud case appeal
shortDescription: A New York appeals court overturned President Donald Trump’s $454M civil fraud fine, calling it improper in a major legal win for the president.

title: Trump says he plans to patrol DC streets alongside law enforcement
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said he will join law enforcement on the streets of Washington, DC, on Aug. 21 amid his federal takeover of DC

title: Cambodian monks declare support for Trump to get Nobel Peace Prize
shortDescription: President Donald Trump has been nominated for a Nobel Peace Prize in the past, but has never won. Cambodian Buddhist monks think he should.

title: Trump's $454 million civil fraud penalty thrown out by appeals court
shortDescription: The $454 million penalty imposed against President Donald Trump in his New York civil fraud case has been thrown out by an appeals court.
